detail_desc: Maxi dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Narrow elastication under the bust and a wide, tiered skirt.

Calf-length skirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and pleats and a sewn-in tie belt at the front. Discreet side pockets and covered buttons down the front. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy weave with a V-shaped opening, concealed buttons and pin-tucks at the front. Double-layered flutter sleeves, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Blouse in an airy weave with a V-shaped opening, concealed buttons and pin-tucks at the front. Double-layered flutter sleeves, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Blouse in an airy weave with a V-shaped opening, concealed buttons and pin-tucks at the front. Double-layered flutter sleeves, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Blouse in an airy weave with a V-shaped opening, concealed buttons and pin-tucks at the front. Double-layered flutter sleeves, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with an asymmetric seam at the top, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
5-pocket, knee-length skirt in washed cotton denim with lightly worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and a high slit at the front. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.

Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with pleats at the front. Buttons at the top, a yoke with pleats at the back, and a pleated flounce trim around the neckline, down the button band and over the shoulders. Unlined.

Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with pleats at the front. Buttons at the top, a yoke with pleats at the back, and a pleated flounce trim around the neckline, down the button band and over the shoulders. Unlined.
Shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a decorative knot on each shoulder strap. Gathered seam at the top and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Set with a vest top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Vest top with a decorative knot on each shoulder strap. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and small frill with overlocked edges at the top.
Trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Chinos in washed cotton twill. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and covered elastication at the hems.
Chinos in washed cotton twill. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and covered elastication at the hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in glittery jersey with a deep V-neck and elasticated spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in glittery jersey with a deep V-neck and elasticated spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Short dress in patterned mesh with a round neckline, short sleeves and flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Short dress in patterned mesh with a round neckline, short sleeves and flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Short dress in patterned mesh with a round neckline, short sleeves and flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter of largest pair 3 cm. Diameter of smallest pair approx. 1 cm. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter of largest pair 3 cm. Diameter of smallest pair approx. 1 cm. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.

A-line dress in tulle with an opening and a shimmering button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication, and gathered tiers on the skirt that create movement. Lined.
A pair of twisted metal hoop earrings. Diameter 2.5 cm.
A pair of twisted metal hoop earrings. Diameter 2.5 cm.
Shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Pre-tied tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener.
Heart-shaped metal earrings with a freshwater pearl pendant. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.

Ankle-length boiler suit in a soft viscose weave with a round neck, buttons to the waist, a yoke at the back, and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button. Small chest pocket, patch front pockets, a seam with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and wide, gently tapered legs.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter 4 cm.
Metal stud and hoop earrings in various designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 2 cm.
Metal earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones and plastic beads. Post at the bottom and a clip at the top. Length 3.5 cm.
Metal bracelets in different designs, one with a curb chain and the other decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with one small, round pendant and one rectangular pendant with a marbled plastic bead. Adjustable length 41-48 cm.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with one small, round pendant and one rectangular pendant with a marbled plastic bead. Adjustable length 41-48 cm.
Necklace of three thin metal chains in various designs. One chain decorated with a metal bead and one with a rod-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Necklace of three thin metal chains in various designs. One chain decorated with a metal bead and one with a rod-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace decorated with round pendants in hammered metal. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
Metal chain necklace with a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. One pair is decorated with rhinestones and four pairs have pendants.
Short, thin metal chain necklace with a bar-shaped bead. Adjustable length approx. 42-50 cm.
Short, thin metal chain necklace with a bar-shaped bead. Adjustable length approx. 42-50 cm.

Coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Discreet side pockets and a single back vent. Satin lining. The polyester content of the coat’s lining is partly recycled.

Coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Discreet side pockets and a single back vent. Satin lining. The polyester content of the coat’s lining is partly recycled.

Coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Discreet side pockets and a single back vent. Satin lining. The polyester content of the coat’s lining is partly recycled.

Coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Discreet side pockets and a single back vent. Satin lining. The polyester content of the coat’s lining is partly recycled.

Cargo joggers in washed cotton canvas. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and bellows pockets with a flap on the legs. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.

Cargo joggers in washed cotton canvas. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and bellows pockets with a flap on the legs. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.

Cargo joggers in washed cotton canvas. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and bellows pockets with a flap on the legs. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and a slit at the front of the hem. Lined.
Flared skirt in tulle with dangling sequins and a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Recycled polyester lining and filling. The polyester content of the jacket’s outer layer is partly recycled.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Recycled polyester lining and filling. The polyester content of the jacket’s outer layer is partly recycled.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Recycled polyester lining and filling. The polyester content of the jacket’s outer layer is partly recycled.
Pleated skirt in an airy weave with covered elastication at the waist. Lined.
Skirt in a woven viscose blend with covered elastication at the back of the waist, a seam at the top and decorative, tiered flounces.
Straight-cut shirt dress in woven fabric with a collar, yoke and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut shirt dress in woven fabric with a collar, yoke and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Pyjama shorts in soft, ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Pyjama shorts in soft, ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and buttons at the front. Seam at the waist with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
Pyjama shorts in soft, gently draping satin with covered elastication at the back of the waist and short slits at the hems.
Pyjama shorts in soft, gently draping satin with covered elastication at the back of the waist and short slits at the hems.
Cropped trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.

Pyjamas with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cool cotton weave with piped trims. Boxy-style shirt with small notch lapels, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.

Knee-length nightshirt in a cool cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket with a decorative piped trim, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft, marled pointelle with overlocked edges. Top with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.

Set with a vest top, pair of shorts and a T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Vest top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Classic T-shirt with ribbing around the neckline.

Set with a vest top, pair of shorts and a T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Vest top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Classic T-shirt with ribbing around the neckline.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Lightly brushed inside.

Lightly brushed inside.
